text: @RahulGandhi What u want from us? You want to believe on ur forcefully provided scripted things from us? What do u think people are st#pid motherf#ckrs like you who are not aware of the economic situation of the globe bcz of COVID19. I am 200% sure u even dont know the 1% of the economy.
